column4: I'm trying to mount my second HD which has my windows NTFS partition.  Following the instructions on the wiki, I can successfully mount it, but the permissions of the directory to which I am mounting it change from the 777 to which the wiki told me to chmod it into 500 permission mask.  Does this sound normal?
do not use 777, besides ntfs does not support permissions at all
The wiki suggested that I sudo mkdir /media/NTFS then chmod 777 it.
If that part of the wiki is wrong, that's fine, but is there a way I can make the RO mount visible to my normal user instead of just root?
